hero.title: We know how to achieve the maximum profit during the successful commercial transactions

about.title: EPI group — independent trading company
about.text-1: We work openly, honestly, transparently, offering a reliable partnership to each customer. The main priority of our activity is.
about.text-3: EPI group offers exclusively certified products from reliable suppliers that meet the highest international quality standards.

activitieslider.text: Powerful scientific and technical base of the enterprise allows us to solve problems of any complexity

slides.title: Energetics
slides.text: Our team has extensive experience in various energy sectors, which allows us to understand the current situation and development trends in the natural gas, oil and coal markets.

slides.title: Minerals and metals
slides.text: By diversifying geographically and strategically linking in different countries with us, you will be able to participate in a limited, specialized supply of minerals, metals and derivatives.

slides.title: Fertilizers
slides.text: Our company offers a wide range of fertilizers for the agricultural industry, which allows us to meet the needs of our customers in full

slides.title: Ammonia
slides.text: We offer ammonia of exclusively certified quality from reliable suppliers that meets the highest international quality standards.

tradeinvestments.title: Trade finance
tradeinvestments.text-1: We help importing companies avoid 100% prepayment in settlements with suppliers and offer low-cost financing on short, medium and long-term basis.

slides.title: If you are an importer
arguments: there is no need to withdraw current assets
the opportunity to cooperate with suppliers on the most favorable terms and at the most favorable prices
no risks of non-shipment by the supplier of the goods when paying under the contract

slides.title: If you are an exporter
arguments: guarantee of payment for the shipped goods
increase in the volume of supplies
expansion of the client base due to more favorable terms of delivery and payment

extraServices.title: Other services
extraServices.text: We provide consulting services in building partnerships and intermediaries in trade, science and other fields. We have ability to monitor services in Ukraine according to a specific assignment of a partner and implement complex logistics solutions
blocks: Mediation in relations with entities interested in cooperation in the field of trade, science, research, education, technological cooperation, as well as in other areas
Search for suitable trade and investment partners for entities interested in Ukraine
Search for business opportunities for organizations that plan to operate in Ukraine
Monitoring of events in Ukraine on a specific assignment of a partner with an emphasis on a specific area of interests of the partner
Monitoring of possible subjects of cooperation in Ukraine
Correct establishment and development of relations in the sphere of interests of a partner in Ukraine
Representing the interests of the Czech Republic, European and non-European organizations in Ukraine
Сonstant monitoring of events in Ukraine, for consultation on appropriate measures in connection with the development of the situation
Monitoring in the legal, business, political spheres, as well as in the field of security of Ukraine
Advising and liaising between the Czech Republic, European and non-European organizations and organizations in Ukraine
Legal advice and support in process of concluding agreements and contracts with Ukrainian organizations
Consulting and providing partners in the field of logistics of goods, finance and information
Consultations on the specific appointment of a partner on the territory of Ukraine
Consultations and providing storage and transportation in Ukraine and abroad (by land, sea and air)
Ensuring transport and logistics security, risk assessment, control of transport security

contact.title: Send us a request
contact.text-1: Want to know more about EPI group s.r.o.?
contact.text-2: From services to approach and people, we are happy to communicate with you.
